name: @six/ui-library-docs
description: Docs for Stencil Component Library following the SIX style guide

scripts.dev: npm run setup && vuepress dev src
scripts.build: npm run setup && vuepress build src
scripts.clean: rimraf src/.vuepress/dist src/.vuepress/lib src/components/* src/.vuepress/components/* src/.vuepress/public/components/assets src/.vuepress/public/components/*.js src/CHANGELOG.md
scripts.setup: npm run setup:copy && npm run setup:components && npm run setup:version
